operations.summary: Authenticates the credentials of an individual guest
operations.notes: The authentication action allows a client to validate the credentials of a guest. The guest may be idetified by either an email address or guest number, accompanied by a password.

parameters.name: application
parameters.description: Unique application identifier for source system

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The guest number or email address of the guest

responseMessages.message: [Unauthorized]   Indicates the user was found but the password is incorrect
[Forbidden]      Returned if the source credentials are incorrect
[Not Found]      The guest could not be found by supplied identifier

success.description: A simple boolean result indicating the success or failure of the request

Result.description: A simple boolean result object indicating the success or failure of the request.

identifier.description: A unique identifier thay may be either an email address or guest number
